name: penumbra
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a part of a shadow in which only some of the light is blocked, used especially about a shadow made during an eclipse: In a lunar eclipse, the outer shadow or penumbra is a zone where Earth blocks a portion of the sun's rays.
IgorKovalchuk/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
